curam.util.audit

Class Audit

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.audit.Audit

  • public final class Audit
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a hook for all audit calls. It is not responsible for logging the audit information, it simply delegates these calls to another class which supports the AuditLogInterface. A default implementation is provided by Curam which writes to the database. This can be overridden by setting the curam.custom.audit.writer application property to the class name of the customized implementation.

      • compactXML

        public static java.lang.String compactXML(java.lang.String originalXML)
        This method produces a compacted version of an XML document. A compact representation is one where the spaces and newlines are removed and the field markers are changed to be a single character.
        Parameters:
        originalXML - The long hand form of the XML document.
        Returns:
        The compacted version of the XML document.
